cast.overview: The spirited Boruto Uzumaki, son of Seventh Hokage Naruto, is a skilled ninja who possesses the same brashness and passion his father once had. However, the constant absence of his father, who is busy with his Hokage duties, puts a damper on Boruto's fire. He ends up meeting his father's friend Sasuke, and requests to become... his apprentice!? The curtain on the story of the new generation rises!
cast.title: Boruto: Naruto the Movie

details.biography: Cocoro Kikuchi (菊池 こころ, Kikuchi Cocoro, November 9, 1982) is a Japanese voice actress born in Tokyo. She is affiliated with Kenyu Office, previously worked for Toei Academy until March, 2011. Her old stage name is Kokoro Kikuchi (菊池 心, Kikuchi Kokoro).
details.name: Cocoro Kikuchi
